text: Petropavlovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Kalmiyarovsky Selsoviet, Tatyshlinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 291 as of 2010. There are 5 streets. == Geography == It is located 21 km from Verkhniye Tatyshly, 1 km from Starokalmiyarovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Tatyshlinsky District
title: Petropavlovka, Tatyshlinsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
